庨字的基本解释

庨
xiāo
〔庨豁（
房屋高深的样子。hu?）〕高峻深邃，如“路侧有绝涧，闸閜庨庨。”

庨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiāo］
［《廣韻》許交切，平肴，曉。］
(1)宫室高貌。
(2)深空貌。参见“庨窌”。
(3)高峻深邃貌。参见“庨豁”。
(4)开阔豁达貌。参见“庨豁”。

庨字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【广字部】　庨； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页346第05
【廣韻】許交切【集韻】【韻會】虛交切，?音哮。【玉篇】庨豁，宮殿形狀。【集韻】宮室高貌。【柳宗元·遊朝陽巖登西亭詩】反宇臨呀庨。　又【馬融·長笛賦】庨窌巧老。【註】深空之貌。　又【集韻】丘交切，音敲。義同。

庨字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
庨字的起名意思

暂无。

Shao
Basic explanation of words
Shao
xiāo
〔Wang Huo (
The height of the house. hu?)] High, steep and deep, such as "there is an absolute stream on the side of the road, and the gate is in the open."
Shao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [xiāo]
["Guangyun" Xu Jiaoqie, Ping Yao, Xiao. ]
(1) The high appearance of the palace.
(2) Deep space appearance. See "Wang Yu".
(3) High and deep appearance. See "Wang Huo".
(4) Broad and open-minded appearance. See "Wang Huo".
Shao
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 2] [Guang Zi Department] 　庨; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 346 05
[Guang Yun] Xu Jiaoqie [Ji Yun] [Yunhui] False intersection, sound roar. 【Jade articles】Wang open, palace shape. 【Jiyun】The palace is tall and beautiful. [Liu Zongyuan·You Chaoyangyan and Dengxiting Poems] Anti-Yu Lin Ye Hao.　[Ma Rong·Flute Fu] You are old and clever. [Note] The appearance of deep space.　 [Ji Yun] Qiu crosses and cuts, sound knocks. The same meaning.
Shao
